00086         public function __construct($key = null, $secret_key = null)

00095         // AUTHENTICATION

00110         public function authenticate($bucket, $opt = null, $location = null, $redirects = 0)
00111         {
00112                 // If nothing was passed in, don't do anything.
00113                 if (!$opt)
00114                 {
00115                         return false;
00116                 }
00117                 else
00118                 {
00119                         // Set default values
00120                         $bucket = strtolower($bucket);
00121                         $acl = null;
00122                         $body = null;
00123                         $contentType = null;
00124                         $delimiter = null;
00125                         $filename = null;
00126                         $marker = null;
00127                         $maxKeys = null;
00128                         $method = null;
00129                         $prefix = null;
00130                         $verb = null;
00131                         $lastmodified = null;
00132                         $etag = null;
00133                         $returnCurlHandle = null;
00134 
00135                         // Break the array into individual variables, while storing the original.
00136                         $_opt = $opt;
00137                         extract($opt);
00138 
00139                         $filename = rawurlencode($filename);
00140 
00141                         // Set hostname
00142                         if ($this->vhost)
00143                         {
00144                                 $hostname = $this->vhost;
00145                         }
00146                         elseif ($method == 'list_buckets')
00147                         {
00148                                 $hostname = 's3.amazonaws.com';
00149                         }
00150                         else
00151                         {
00152                                 $hostname = $bucket . '.s3.amazonaws.com';
00153                         }
00154 
00155                         // Get the UTC timestamp in RFC 2616 format
00156                         $since_epoch = time() + $this->adjust_offset;
00157                         $httpDate = gmdate(DATE_AWS_RFC2616, $since_epoch);
00158 
00159                         // Generate the request string
00160                         $request = '';
00161 
00162                         // Append additional parameters
00163                         $request .= '/' . $filename;
00164 
00165                         // List Object settings
00166                         if ($method == 'list_objects')
00167                         {
00168                                 if (isset($prefix) && !empty($prefix))
00169                                 {
00170                                         $request = '/?prefix=' . $prefix;
00171                                 }
00172                                 else if (isset($marker) && !empty($marker))
00173                                 {
00174                                         $request = '/?marker=' . $marker;
00175                                 }
00176                                 else if (isset($maxKeys) && !empty($maxKeys))
00177                                 {
00178                                         $request = '/?max-keys=' . $maxKeys;
00179                                 }
00180                                 else if (isset($delimiter) && !empty($delimiter))
00181                                 {
00182                                         $request = '/?delimiter=' . $delimiter;
00183                                 }
00184                         }
00185 
00186                         // Logging
00187                         elseif ($method == 'get_logs')
00188                         {
00189                                 $request .= '?logging';
00190                                 $filename .= '?logging';
00191                         }
00192 
00193                         // Get Bucket Locale settings
00194                         elseif ($method == 'get_bucket_locale')
00195                         {
00196                                 $request = '/?location';
00197                                 $filename = '?location';
00198                         }
00199 
00200                         // Add ACL stuff if we're getting/setting ACL preferences.
00201                         elseif ($method == 'get_bucket_acl' || $method == 'get_object_acl')
00202                         {
00203                                 $request .= '?acl';
00204                                 $filename .= '?acl';
00205                         }
00206 
00207                         if (!$request == '/')
00208                         {
00209                                 $request = '/' . $request;
00210                         }
00211 
00212                         // Prepare the request.
00213                         if ($location)
00214                         {
00215                                 $this->request_url = $location;
00216                         }
00217                         else
00218                         {
00219                                 $this->request_url = 'http://' . $hostname . $request;
00220                         }
00221 
00222                         $req = new $this->request_class($this->request_url);
00223 
00224                         // Do we have a verb?
00225                         if (isset($verb) && !empty($verb))
00226                         {
00227                                 $req->setMethod($verb);
00228                         }
00229 
00230                         // Do we have a contentType?
00231                         if (isset($contentType) && !empty($contentType))
00232                         {
00233                                 $req->addHeader("Content-Type", $contentType);
00234                         }
00235                         else if ($verb == HTTP_PUT) // Set a default value for HTTP_PUT
00236                         {
00237                                 $contentType = 'application/x-www-form-urlencoded';
00238                         }
00239 
00240                         // Do we have a date?
00241                         if (isset($httpDate) && !empty($httpDate))
00242                         {
00243                                 $req->addHeader("Date", $httpDate);
00244                         }
00245 
00246                         // Do we have ACL settings? (Optional in signed string)
00247                         if (isset($acl) && !empty($acl))
00248                         {
00249                                 $req->addHeader("x-amz-acl", $acl);
00250                                 $acl = 'x-amz-acl:' . $acl . "\n";
00251                         }
00252 
00253                         // Do we have COPY settings?
00254                         if ($method == 'copy_object')
00255                         {
00256                                 $acl .= 'x-amz-copy-source:/' . $sourceBucket . '/' . $sourceObject . "\n";
00257                                 $req->addHeader('x-amz-copy-source', '/' . $sourceBucket . '/' . $sourceObject);
00258                         }
00259 
00260                         // Are we checking for changes?
00261                         if ($lastmodified && $etag)
00262                         {
00263                                 $req->addHeader('If-Modified-Since', $lastmodified);
00264                                 $req->addHeader('If-None-Match', $etag);
00265                         }
00266 
00267                         // Add a body if we're creating
00268                         if ($method == 'create_object' || $method == 'create_bucket')
00269                         {
00270                                 if (isset($body) && !empty($body))
00271                                 {
00272                                         $req->setBody($body);
00273                                 }
00274                         }
00275 
00276                         // Data that will be "signed".
00277                         $filename = '/' . $filename;
00278 
00279                         // If we're listing buckets, there is no filename value.
00280                         if ($method == 'list_buckets')
00281                         {
00282                                 $filename = '';
00283                         }
00284 
00285                         if ($qsa)
00286                         {
00287                                 // Prepare the string to sign
00288                                 $stringToSign = "$verb\n\n$contentType\n$since_epoch\n$acl/$bucket$filename";
00289                         }
00290                         else
00291                         {
00292                                 // Prepare the string to sign
00293                                 $stringToSign = "$verb\n\n$contentType\n$httpDate\n$acl/$bucket$filename";
00294                         }
00295 
00296                         // Hash the AWS secret key and generate a signature for the request.
00297                         $signature = $this->util->hex_to_base64(hash_hmac('sha1', $stringToSign, $this->secret_key));
00298 
00299                         // Pass the developer key and signature
00300                         $req->addHeader("Authorization", "AWS " . $this->key . ":" . $signature);
00301 
00302                         // If we have a "true" value for returnCurlHandle, do that instead of completing the request.
00303                         if ($returnCurlHandle)
00304                         {
00305                                 return $req->prepRequest();
00306                         }
00307 
00308                         // Are we getting a Query String Auth?
00309                         if ($qsa)
00310                         {
00311                                 return array(
00312                                         'bucket' => $bucket,
00313                                         'filename' => $filename,
00314                                         'key' => $this->key,
00315                                         'expires' => $since_epoch,
00316                                         'signature' => $signature,
00317                                 );
00318                         }
00319 
00320                         // Send!
00321                         $req->sendRequest();
00322 
00323                         // Prepare the response.
00324                         $headers = $req->getResponseHeader();
00325                         $headers['x-tarzan-redirects'] = $redirects;
00326                         $headers['x-tarzan-requesturl'] = $this->request_url;
00327                         $headers['x-tarzan-stringtosign'] = $stringToSign;
00328                         $headers['x-tarzan-requestheaders'] = $req->request_headers;
00329                         $data = new $this->response_class($headers, $req->getResponseBody(), $req->getResponseCode());
00330 
00331                         // Did Amazon tell us to redirect? Typically happens for multiple rapid requests EU datacenters.
00332                         // @see http://docs.amazonwebservices.com/AmazonS3/2006-03-01/Redirects.html
00333                         if ((int) $req->getResponseCode() == 307) // Temporary redirect to new endpoint.
00334                         {
00335                                 $redirects++;
00336                                 $data = $this->authenticate($bucket, 
00337                                         $_opt, 
00338                                         $headers['location'], 
00339                                         $redirects);
00340                         }
00341 
00342                         // Return!
00343                         return $data;
00344                 }
00345         }

00380         public function create_bucket($bucket, $locale = null, $returnCurlHandle = null)
00381         {
00382                 // Defaults
00383                 $body = null;
00384                 $contentType = null;
00385 
00386                 if ($locale)
00387                 {
00388                         switch(strtolower($locale))
00389                         {
00390                                 case 'eu':
00391                                         $body = '<CreateBucketConfiguration><LocationConstraint>' . strtoupper($locale) . '</LocationConstraint></CreateBucketConfiguration>';
00392                                         $contentType = 'application/xml';
00393                                         break;
00394                         }
00395                 }
00396 
00397                 // Authenticate to S3
00398                 return $this->authenticate($bucket, array(
00399                         'verb' => HTTP_PUT,
00400                         'method' => 'create_bucket',
00401                         'body' => $body,
00402                         'contentType' => $contentType,
00403                         'returnCurlHandle' => $returnCurlHandle
00404                 ));
00405         }

00494         public function delete_bucket($bucket, $force = false, $returnCurlHandle = null)
00495         {
00496                 // Set default value
00497                 $success = true;
00498 
00499                 if ($force)
00500                 {
00501                         // Delete all of the items from the bucket.
00502                         $success = $this->delete_all_objects($bucket);
00503                 }
00504 
00505                 // As long as we were successful...
00506                 if ($success)
00507                 {
00508                         // Add this to our request
00509                         $opt = array();
00510                         $opt['verb'] = HTTP_DELETE;
00511                         $opt['method'] = 'delete_bucket';
00512                         $opt['returnCurlHandle'] = $returnCurlHandle;
00513 
00514                         // Authenticate to S3
00515                         return $this->authenticate($bucket, $opt);
00516                 }
00517 
00518                 return false;
00519         }
00520 
00531         public function copy_bucket($source_bucket, $dest_bucket)
00532         {
00533                 $dest = $this->create_bucket($dest_bucket);
00534 
00535                 if ($dest->isOK())
00536                 {
00537                         $list = $this->get_object_list($source_bucket);
00538                         $handles = array();
00539         
00540                         foreach ($list as $item)
00541                         {
00542                                 $handles[] = $this->copy_object($source_bucket, $item, $dest_bucket, $item, S3_ACL_PRIVATE, true);
00543                         }
00544 
00545                         $request = new $this->request_class(null);
00546                         return $request->sendMultiRequest($handles);
00547                 }
00548         }
00549 
00560         public function rename_bucket($source_bucket, $dest_bucket)
00561         {
00562                 $responses = array();
00563                 $responses['copy'] = $this->copy_bucket($source_bucket, $dest_bucket);
00564                 $responses['delete'] = $this->delete_bucket($source_bucket, true);
00565 
00566                 return $responses;
00567         }

00593         public function get_bucket_filesize($bucket, $friendly_format = false)
00594         {
00595                 $filesize = 0;
00596                 $list = $this->list_objects($bucket);
00597 
00598                 foreach ($list->body->Contents as $filename)
00599                 {
00600                         $filesize += (int) $filename->Size;
00601                 }
00602 
00603                 if ($friendly_format)
00604                 {
00605                         $filesize = $this->util->size_readable($filesize);
00606                 }
00607 
00608                 return $filesize;
00609         }

00640         public function get_bucket_list($pcre = null)
00641         {
00642                 // Set some default values
00643                 $bucketnames = array();
00644 
00645                 // Get a list of buckets.
00646                 $list = $this->list_buckets();
00647 
00648                 // If we have a PCRE regex, store it.
00649                 if ($pcre)
00650                 {
00651                         // Loop through and find the bucket names.
00652                         foreach ($list->body->Buckets->Bucket as $bucket)
00653                         {
00654                                 $bucket = (string) $bucket->Name;
00655 
00656                                 if (preg_match($pcre, $bucket))
00657                                 {
00658                                         $bucketnames[] = $bucket;
00659                                 }
00660                         }
00661                 }
00662                 else
00663                 {
00664                         // Loop through and find the bucket names.
00665                         foreach ($list->body->Buckets->Bucket as $bucket)
00666                         {
00667                                 $bucketnames[] = (string) $bucket->Name;
00668                         }
00669                 }
00670 
00671                 return (count($bucketnames) > 0) ? $bucketnames : null;
00672         }

00862         public function delete_all_objects($bucket, $pcre = S3_PCRE_ALL)
00863         {
00864                 // Collect all matches
00865                 $list = $this->get_object_list($bucket, array('pcre', $pcre));
00866 
00867                 // As long as we have at least one match...
00868                 if (count($list) > 0)
00869                 {
00870                         // Hold CURL handles
00871                         $handles = array();
00872 
00873                         // Go through all of the items and delete them.
00874                         foreach ($list as $item)
00875                         {
00876                                 $handles[] = $this->delete_object($bucket, $item, true);
00877                         }
00878 
00879                         $request = new $this->request_class(null);
00880                         return $request->sendMultiRequest($handles);
00881                 }
00882 
00883                 return false;
00884         }

00926         public function get_object_filesize($bucket, $filename, $friendly_format = false)
00927         {
00928                 $object = $this->head_object($bucket, $filename);
00929                 $filesize = (integer) $object->header['content-length'];
00930 
00931                 if ($friendly_format)
00932                 {
00933                         $filesize = $this->util->size_readable($filesize);
00934                 }
00935 
00936                 return $filesize;
00937         }

00957         public function get_object_list($bucket, $opt = null)
00958         {
00959                 // Set some default values
00960                 $filenames = array();
00961                 $pcre = null;
00962 
00963                 // Get a list of files.
00964                 $list = $this->list_objects($bucket, $opt);
00965 
00966                 // Extract the options
00967                 if ($opt)
00968                 {
00969                         extract($opt);
00970                 }
00971 
00972                 // If we have a PCRE regex, store it.
00973                 if ($pcre)
00974                 {
00975                         // Loop through and find the filenames.
00976                         foreach ($list->body->Contents as $file)
00977                         {
00978                                 $file = (string) $file->Key;
00979 
00980                                 if (preg_match($pcre, $file))
00981                                 {
00982                                         $filenames[] = $file;
00983                                 }
00984                         }
00985                 }
00986                 else
00987                 {
00988                         // Loop through and find the filenames.
00989                         foreach ($list->body->Contents as $file)
00990                         {
00991                                 $filenames[] = (string) $file->Key;
00992                         }
00993                 }
00994 
00995                 return (count($filenames) > 0) ? $filenames : null;
00996         }
00997 
01015         public function copy_object($source_bucket, $source_filename, $dest_bucket, $dest_filename, $acl = S3_ACL_PRIVATE, $returnCurlHandle = null)
01016         {
01017                 // Add this to our request
01018                 $opt['verb'] = HTTP_PUT;
01019                 $opt['method'] = 'copy_object';
01020                 $opt['sourceBucket'] = $source_bucket;
01021                 $opt['sourceObject'] = $source_filename;
01022                 $opt['destinationBucket'] = $dest_bucket;
01023                 $opt['destinationObject'] = $dest_filename;
01024                 $opt['metadataDirective'] = 'COPY';
01025                 $opt['acl'] = $acl;
01026                 $opt['filename'] = rawurlencode($dest_filename);
01027                 $opt['returnCurlHandle'] = $returnCurlHandle;
01028 
01029                 // Authenticate to S3
01030                 return $this->authenticate($dest_bucket, $opt);
01031         }

01063         public function move_object($source_bucket, $source_filename, $dest_bucket, $dest_filename, $acl = S3_ACL_PRIVATE)
01064         {
01065                 $copy = $this->copy_object($source_bucket, $source_filename, $dest_bucket, $dest_filename, $acl);
01066                 $del = $this->delete_object($source_bucket, $source_filename);
01067                 return $copy;
01068         }

01150         public function get_logs($bucket)
01151         {
01152                 // Add this to our request
01153                 $opt['verb'] = HTTP_GET;
01154                 $opt['method'] = 'get_logs';
01155 
01156                 // Authenticate to S3
01157                 return $this->authenticate($bucket, $opt);
01158         }

01169

01185         /*%******************************************************************************************%*/
01186         // MISCELLANEOUS METHODS
01187 
01204         public function store_remote_file($remote_file, $bucket, $filename, $opt = null)
01205         {
01206                 // Set default values.
01207                 $acl = S3_ACL_PUBLIC;
01208                 $overwrite = false;
01209                 $cname = null;
01210 
01211                 if ($opt)
01212                 {
01213                         // Break the options out.
01214                         extract($opt);
01215                 }
01216 
01217                 // Does the file already exist?
01218                 $object = $this->head_object($bucket, $filename);
01219 
01220                 // As long as it doesn't already exist, fetch and store it.
01221                 if (!$object->isOK() || $overwrite)
01222                 {
01223                         // Fetch the file
01224                         $file = new $this->request_class($remote_file);
01225                         $file->sendRequest();
01226 
01227                         // Store it in S3
01228                         unset($object);
01229                         $object = $this->create_object($bucket, array(
01230                                 'filename' => $filename,
01231                                 'body' => $file->getResponseBody(),
01232                                 'contentType' => $file->getResponseHeader('content-type'),
01233                                 'acl' => $acl
01234                         ));
01235                 }
01236 
01237                 // Was the request successful?
01238                 if ($object->isOK())
01239                 {
01240                         $url = $object->header['x-tarzan-requesturl'];
01241 
01242                         // If we have a virtual host value, use that instead of Amazon's hostname. There are better ways of doing this, but it works for now.
01243                         if ($this->vhost)
01244                         {
01245                                 $url = str_ireplace('http://', '', $url);
01246                                 $url = explode('/', $url);
01247                                 $url[0] = $this->vhost;
01248                                 $url = 'http://' . implode('/', $url);
01249                         }
01250 
01251                         return $url;
01252                 }
01253                 else
01254                 {
01255                         return null;
01256                 }
01257         }
01258 
01270         public function get_object_url($bucket, $filename, $qsa = 0)
01271         {
01272                 if ($qsa)
01273                 {
01274                         // Add this to our request
01275                         $opt['verb'] = HTTP_GET;
01276                         $opt['method'] = 'get_object_url';
01277                         $opt['filename'] = $filename;
01278                         $opt['qsa'] = $qsa;
01279 
01280                         // Adjust the clock
01281                         $old_offset = $this->adjust_offset;
01282                         $this->adjust_offset($qsa);
01283 
01284                         // Authenticate to S3
01285                         $data = $this->authenticate($bucket, $opt);
01286 
01287                         // Reset the clock
01288                         $this->adjust_offset = $old_offset;
01289 
01290                         if ($this->vhost)
01291                         {
01292                                 return 'http://' . $this->vhost . $data['filename'] . '?AWSAccessKeyId=' . $data['key'] . '&Expires=' . $data['expires'] . '&Signature=' . rawurlencode($data['signature']);
01293                         }
01294                         
01295                         return 'http://' . $data['bucket'] . '.s3.amazonaws.com' . $data['filename'] . '?AWSAccessKeyId=' . $data['key'] . '&Expires=' . $data['expires'] . '&Signature=' . rawurlencode($data['signature']);
01296                 }
01297                 else
01298                 {
01299                         // If we're using a virtual host, use that instead.
01300                         if ($this->vhost)
01301                         {
01302                                 return 'http://' . $this->vhost . '/' . $filename;
01303                         }
01304 
01305                         return 'http://' . $bucket . '.s3.amazonaws.com/' . $filename;
01306                 }
01307         }
01308 
01320         public function get_torrent_url($bucket, $filename)
01321         {
01322                 // If we're using a virtual host, use that instead.
01323                 if ($this->vhost)
01324                 {
01325                         return 'http://' . $this->vhost . '/' . $filename . '?torrent';
01326                 }
01327                 return 'http://' . $bucket . '.s3.amazonaws.com/' . $filename . '?torrent';
01328         }
